about_the_game:
The Ancien Cat Temple is a small Metroidvania (40min - 1hour approximately) where you are an archeologist cat who will explore the cave that holds the wonders of an ancient civilization. On your back is a lantern that will help you to light your way through this dark cave.

However, the flashlight is not always your best option, cave mushrooms are fluorescent but will only light up when you touch them and there is no other source of light on.

Explore the cave find puzzles and the tools needed to unravel these puzzles.

But be careful! Lights on at unnecessary times can end up attracting dangerous creatures!
detailed_description:
The Ancien Cat Temple is a small Metroidvania (40min - 1hour approximately) where you are an archeologist cat who will explore the cave that holds the wonders of an ancient civilization. On your back is a lantern that will help you to light your way through this dark cave.

However, the flashlight is not always your best option, cave mushrooms are fluorescent but will only light up when you touch them and there is no other source of light on.

Explore the cave find puzzles and the tools needed to unravel these puzzles.

But be careful! Lights on at unnecessary times can end up attracting dangerous creatures!
name: The Ancient Cat Temple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: This is a little Metroidvania where you control a cute archeologist cat trying to find the secrets of an ancient civilization. Explore, solve puzzles and be careful, the brightest path is not always the safest.
